Perceptor:


Perceptor was injuried by the granade's explotion, but he didn't 
quit. He pop up and transformed quicly to his robot mode shooting 
against Kairser 25 times


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        Immediately realizing his error he holsters one blaster and 
draws a 
> scimitar to parry the oncoming Devilcat's slashes.  "Frankly, sir, 
I didn't 
> know particularly well who you were."  He grunts and holsters his 
other 
> weapon tossing a small concussion grenade down Perceptor's hole.  
He then 
> turns back to Devilcat.  "Now then, I assure you, you will not 
enjoy my full 
> attention."
